short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Honeit interview platform turns phone screens and video interviews into insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily schedule interviews or call candidates directly using Honeit's integrated Chrome Extension!

NO MORE TYPING NOTES...
Honeit automatically records, transcribes, indexes, parses and stores all your interview questions and answers securely in the cloud. Honeit interview technology was designed by recruiters for recruiters!

TALK SOONER...
Dial-out directly to candidates or automate call scheduling with Honeit scheduling links. Honeit automatically sends calendar invites, email reminders and SMS text messages.

CALL HIGHLIGHTS...
After an intake call or phone screen, share the key moments from the call to excite passive candidates and delight your clients.

SEARCHABLE INSIGHTS...
No typing notes. Never forget a detail. Easily search interview questions, answers, tags, notes and call transcripts from phone or video calls.

EASY INTEGRATION...
Export or download interview questions, answers, tags, notes and call transcripts.


Request a free demo account by visiting www.honeit.com and start interviewing today!
